column4: I was tempted for a while with my linksys but eventually manged to sort it
in my own experience, it is technically a awesome piece of work but confusingly complicated if something does not work at first or second attempt.
I might try it once I get a new router. have you successfully done one?
if i would buy a new one, eventually one of these USRobotics devices. I heard the brand linksys has been obsoleted by cisco
